connect_page.subtitle_telegram: This is the final step to be able to send notes directly from Telegram.
connect_page.subtitle_whatsapp: This is the final step to be able to send notes directly from WhatsApp.
connect_page.instructions_telegram_step_1: Open the Telegram app and search for the bot
connect_page.instructions_telegram_step_2: Press the START button in the conversation with the bot.
connect_page.instructions_telegram_step_3: The bot will immediately reply with your numeric ID.
connect_page.instructions_telegram_step_4: Copy that ID and enter it in the field below.
connect_page.instructions_whatsapp_step_1: Add our WhatsApp number to your contacts:
connect_page.instructions_whatsapp_step_2: Send the message /start to this number.
connect_page.instructions_whatsapp_step_3: You will receive a message back containing your ID (a string of numbers).
connect_page.instructions_whatsapp_step_4: Copy that ID and enter it in the field below.
connect_page.success_message: Account connected successfully! You will be redirected...
